verses.roman:
acetana hañā prabhu bhūmite paḍilā
mukhe phenā paḍe, nāsāya śvāsa ruddha hailā

synonyms: acetana—unconscious; hañā—becoming; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhūmite paḍilā—fell on the ground; mukhe—at the mouth; phenā paḍe—there was foam; nāsāya—in the nostrils; śvāsa—breath; ruddha hailā—stopped.
translation: Filled with ecstatic love, the Lord fell unconscious to the ground. He foamed about the mouth, and His breathing stopped.
